name: @monospace-tw/amego-invoice
description: Taiwan E-Invoice SDK for Amego (光貿電子發票加值中心)

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:cjs:fixup && chmod +x ./dist/cjs/cli.js ./dist/esm/mcp.js
scripts.build:mcpb: npm run build:mcpb:bundle && cd extension && mcpb pack && mv extension.mcpb ../amego-invoice-$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version").mcpb
scripts.build:mcpb:bundle: esbuild src/mcp.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=cjs --outfile=extension/server/mcp.tmp.js --minify && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > extension/server/mcp.js && tail -n +2 extension/server/mcp.tmp.js >> extension/server/mcp.js && rm extension/server/mcp.tmp.js && chmod +x extension/server/mcp.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:run

author: Monospace Taiwan
